      • initializeAndGetNumDifferences

        public long initializeAndGetNumDifferences(int dimension,
                                  int numBytes)
                                    throws InvalidArgumentError
        Description copied from interface: DifferenceBuilder
        Initializes the computation process and returns the number of differences.
        Specified by:
        initializeAndGetNumDifferences in interface DifferenceBuilder
        Overrides:
        initializeAndGetNumDifferences in class BitwiseDifferenceBuilder
        Returns:
        Returns the number of results.
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentError - If the maxWeight is larger than the number of bits/bytes in the values n, then the whole creation process is senseless, as all possible n-bit/n-byte values will be valid and an exception is thrown. If maxWeight is less than 1, only 0 will be valid, thus exception is thrown.

      • next

        Description copied from interface: DifferenceBuilder
        Computes the next n-bit/n-byte value with n bits/n bytes and less or equal '1' bytes as specified in the DifferenceBuilder.initializeAndGetNumDifferences(int, int) method before.
